about.title: Fullstack Developer passionate about clean code and scalable solutions
about.description: Over two years of experience in a B2B startup, working on creating, optimizing, and maintaining web solutions. Focus on system performance, MongoDB query optimization, and technical mentoring. Solid knowledge of JavaScript, Node.js (NestJS, Express), Vue.js, and Serverless architecture.

jobs.title: Fullstack Developer (Junior)

Responsible for technical mentoring and onboarding new interns to the company's stack.
Active participation in the PCI DSS security certification process, adapting system components to required standards.

jobs.title: Fullstack Development Intern
points: Creation of responsive UI components with Vue.js and collaboration in agile methodologies.

items.title: My Personal Portfolio
items.description: This dynamic portfolio, built with Vue 3, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, employs Glassmorphism principle.

items.title: My Finances
items.description: Full-stack app for personal financial management.
items.challenge: Excel spreadsheets were no longer sufficient for effective financial control and tracking personal goals.
items.solution: I developed a full-stack application with a NestJS/GraphQL backend and a Vue.js 3 frontend, creating interactive dashboards for visual management.

items.title: Beauty Manager
items.description: Academic application for beauty salon scheduling.
items.challenge: My mother's beauty salon struggled with manual scheduling, which caused errors like double bookings or forgotten appointments.
items.solution: I created a scheduling application with a REST API (Python/FastAPI) and a React frontend, allowing clients and administrators to manage schedules.

items.title: Gestalt in Media
items.description: Academic interactive media on Gestalt principles.
items.challenge: Translate theoretical Gestalt concepts into a digital experience, explaining how these principles apply in movies, series, and games.
items.solution: I developed an interactive media using React, TypeScript, and Vite. The site visually presents the concepts and exemplifies Gestalt in the context of these media.
